name: The Court of Bhell
description:
You find yourself summoned to the Court of Bhell, a local demon, and they have a - fun - game for you. Three weapons in the room will spew bullets and you will dance your way through them. You make it and they just might want more - with upgraded weapons!

Made in 4.5 hours (oops) for Trijam 166

Tools used

  • Unity 2018.4
  • Aseprite
  • Reaper
  • FMod
  • Audacity
  • SFXR
